It is the world’s first comprehensive conference on open hardware; a venue and community in which we discuss and draw attention to the rapidly growing Open Source Hardware movement.","marks":[],"data":{}}]},{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"From 2013-2018 the Open Hardware Summit was chaired by Addie Wagenknecht. The Summit chair also serves as a board member.","marks":[],"data":{}}]},{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"We are going VIRTUAL but we are so excited about the talks we've got lined up.","marks":[],"data":{}}]},{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"Starting with Meghan McCarthy on COVID 3D trust then moving into André Maia Chagas speaking about open hardware makers mentorship program, Rico Euripidou and Katie Gradowski highlighting how we can mobilize people to act on air pollution,  Alison Parker and Alex Long on how oshw supported the COVID19 response, and Laura Lytle and Alice Stewart on the rise of open, personal sex tech.","marks":[],"data":{}}]},{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"Plus another 12 talks from speakers like Adam Benzion, Dahl Winters, Helen Leigh, Fred Benenson, LeeLee James and more!","marks":[],"data":{}}]},{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"See you online","marks":[],"data":{}}]}]}
